All ships in my Pharaoh Fleet to make up a whole fleet of ships that would make a good necron gothic style fleet.

Ships are supplied supported or not supported.

There are 5 Ship types:

Pharaoh Fleet:
------------------
- Seti Class Battleship
- Pepi Class Cruiser
- Isesi Class Light Cruiser (Free Download)
- Teti Class Escort
- Unas Class Escort
- Pepi Class Cruiser

3 turrets for the cruiser and battleship.

READY WITH A HOLE FOR A 2MM FLIGHT STAND THAT IS FAIRLY STANDARD. CAN INSTEAD BE FITTED WITH A 4MM MAGNET IF YOU MAGNETISE YOUR STANDS.
(I do have a free stand download but there are loads to pick from. The one with a brass rod is a free download on my profile.)

FOR PERSONAL USE, NOT FOR RESALE AS A DIGITAL FILE OR PRINTED COPIES

Designer notes:
The battleship arms can be pointed forwards or backwards

Justification du tag SUP :

Ships are supplied supported or not supported.

Necron fleet elements for Microfleet Gothic. All ships are scaled at roughly 50% of original size, and have an integrated receptor for a 5x1mm magnet on the underside of the hull.

Ships in this set designed by MKHand Industries. Say thanks by giving him a tip!

Bases, templates, and guidelines for playing Microfleet Gothic can be found here:
https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:4459459

item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > johnthewarlock > Living_Metal_Fleet [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:4103757

Id objet : 4103757

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte

Collections pour tags :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

I have been working on some ships to be used as proxies for necrons in the now OOP game of space combat in the 41st millennium, BFG. I have two more to complete, but until then here are the first three. The Jackal is scaled down from the one I posted previously. If you would like it larger, you can get that one here: https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:3998233

There are small pilot holes drilled in the underside for convenience. You can of course ignor them and put the hole where you wish. I also do not recommend printing the complete Shroud Cruiser. It is slapped together just to demonstrate how it goes together. Enjoy!

I have zipped everything together for download just in case the verse of things decides that it cannot zip them for you. :)

item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > johnthewarlock > Living_Metal_Jackal_Escort [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:3998233

Id objet : 3998233

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte

Collections pour tags :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5
6
7

Behold the Living Metal Jackal Raider!! It is meant for use in the no longer available space combat game set in the gothic sector. I have scaled it against the Nova and Gladius frigates that I have previously posted.

I test printed this on an FDM printer with a .4 nozzle. If it is scaled down I would recommend a .2 nozzle or a resin printer.

Enjoy! I am working on a number of other craft and I will post them as I complete them.

This was all hand created from base primitives. No copyright infringement is intended.

Friend asked me to tweek Mkhand_Industries' Necron Tombship to be a little closer to the original metals so I scaled down the moon parts's height, increased the size of the pyramids deck and scaled up one of the medium pyramids, also added some side plates along the back section.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > Mkhand_Industries > Necron_Tombships [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/necron-tombships

Id objet : necron-tombships

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte

Collections pour tags :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

The tombships of the necron fleets are monstrous in size and extremely well armed. While not as agile as smaller vessels, they are still able to quickly accelerate to speeds that many vessels of the Imperial Navy cannot match. The sight of one bearing down has paralyzed many ship's crews into inaction, even as mass teleporter arrays activate and the decks are flooded with mechanical nightmares.

Good for BFG or other, inferior, space games. Not found in Epic Armageddon, I guess the list creators assumed if the tombship got to orbit then there was no need to play things out on the ground!

2021/03/09: Made the body itself thinner, and split it into more sub-pieces which can be reassembled in Meshmixer if one so chooses.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > Mkhand_Industries > Jackal_Class_Raider [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/necron-jackal-class-raider

Id objet : necron-jackal-class-raider

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte

Collections pour tags :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

The Jackal class is a much larger and more unfortunately encountered vessel than the Dirge, having been present in every known encounter between the harvest fleets and the Imperial Navy. In addition to its fearsome weapons, it also carries an appreciable number of troops which are able to teleport aboard enemy vessels.

Might be ruining the goodwill I have from the wider BFG community with this. Good for BFG, better for Epic: Armageddon than the Dirge. Has a 3mm hole to fit standard GW flying stands.

2022-08-23: Added a version with smoother curves.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > Mkhand_Industries > Dirge_Class_Raider [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/necron-dirge-class-raider

Id objet : necron-dirge-class-raider

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte

Collections pour tags :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5
6

The Dirge class raider is a small vessel that like all harvest vessels will give and take punches above its weight class; if its opponents can catch up to it. Thankfully for the Imperial Navy it is rarely encountered, and even rarer in significant numbers.


Of all the factions present in BFG, the fleet most people would tell me to leave alone. Find them in BFG: Armada (the book, not the computer game). In a pinch can also be used to give orbital support in games of Epic Armageddon. Comes with a 3mm hole to support standard flying stands.

2022-08-24: Added a version with smoother curves

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > Mkhand_Industries > Necron_Harvester_Ships [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/necron-harvester-ships

Id objet : necron-harvester-ships

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte

Collections pour tags :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3

The harvesters of the Necrons appear spindly and frail next to the ships of the Imperial Navy, but are faster and more heavily armed than most Imperial cruisers and able to shrug off battleship levels of firepower.

Good for games of Battlefleet Gothic and Epic: Armageddon. Find the Cartouche class Light Harvester's rules in BFG: XR.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > Mkhand_Industries > Necron_Ordnance [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/necron-ordnance

Id objet : necron-ordnance

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte

Collections pour tags :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3

While necron fleets have not been recorded as using ordnance against the Imperial Navy, ships attempting exterminatus on active necron tomb-worlds often deal with swarms of these deadly craft.

A little idea that has been bouncing around my head for weeks, so I had to let it out. In certain BFG scenarios the defender of a planet gains access to world based ordnance so I figured these may be of use to somebody. A large size provided for those who cannot print the tiny ones with satisfactory results.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > Mkhand_Industries > Necron_Menat_Class_Heavy_Raider [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/necron-menat-class-heavy-raider

Id objet : necron-menat-class-heavy-raider

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte

Collections pour tags :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3

As the necrons face increasing resistance they awaken ever more destructive machines. One such new vessel, codified as the Menat class, is a heavy raider in the same basic design as its smaller brethren. The Imperial Navy is yet to have confirmed capabilities for it, but like all necron vessels it carries a threat rating of the highest level.

Made from discarded bits while I was working on the Shroud. Use it an alternative Jackal because there aren't rules for anything like this that I am aware of for BFG. Compatible with GW flight stands.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > Mkhand_Industries > Necron_Shroud_Class_Harvester [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/necron-shroud-class-harvester

Id objet : necron-shroud-class-harvester

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte

Collections pour tags :

  • bfg NECRONS Flotte NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

Only encountered by the Imperial Navy in a handful of recorded occasions, the Shroud is a particularly worrisome foe not for its destructive power (which is excessive, like all necron vessels) but as it is able to pick out minute vulnerabilities in the most invulnerable defences for the rest of its comrades to exploit.

With this the necron fleet is finally finished. The least satifactory of the necron designs, I could never figure out an angle for the side wing-disks that felt right. Good for Battlefleet Gothic, or use it for orbital support in Epic: Armageddon.

Sorry, no assembled .stl because saving with the side wing-disks at their funny angle causes unintended mesh abominations.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > Tezca > Necron_Scythe_Cruiser [non dl]

Collections pour tags :

Description :

1
2
3

The Version 1 Scythe is a double decker. I wanted to defy the limitations of gravity with a space ship that is built up vertically as well as horizontally.

If the V1 Scythe is just too much for you, I added the V2 pieces to get a smaller ship, but at the cost of just looking like a scaled down Tomb Ship.
